# setuptools 20.2 is broken with:
# File "python2.7/site-packages/pkg_resources/_vendor/packaging/requirements.py", line 94, in __init__
# pkg_resources._vendor.packaging.requirements.InvalidRequirement: Invalid requirement, parse error at "'; sys.pl'"

tox>=1.9
# IPython 3.x requires an older version of path.py:
# https://github.com/pickleshare/pickleshare/issues/8
path.py==7.7.1
ipython[all]==3.2.1
